author: dain
msg: A NoSuchEntityException from a BMP ejbLoad must be converted to a NoSuchObjectException
Entity bean proxies should not be invalidated since an entity bean can seamlessly reattach to a new instance loaded from the database

msg: Port java introspection/annotation processers over the assembly/java model

msg: Added an intermediate abstract class to handle the DN, and removed the painfull casts all over the code
